instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: acer aspire e 15 e5-571-63we board
threads.message:
Hi everyone,
I know this is not a mac related issue. I have seen couple of acer laptops where they don't turn but take charge. So, when the power button is pressed, the power led comes on for a a sec or two, the fan spins, you hear the hard drive click and powers off. Most of the times what I i have done is take the battery out, unplug the charger and press/hold the power button for 1 minute and put the batt back, it turns on. Any help is appreciated. Does anyone have a logical explanation?

threads.title: acer aspire e 15 e5-571-63we board
threads.message: No idea, but many times I see corrupted BIOSes on these boards. Always save a backup for the WIN8 license key!
